AudioData.Text: Welcome! I'll guide you through this course..
Teleport to the first station. Press and hold the trigger button to aim at the blue teleportation spot. Release the trigger button to teleport there.

Let's first use the transformer in front of you to make a cube out of the sphere to your left. Grab it by pressing the grab button on your controller. The grab button is on the side of your controller.
Now put it on the highlighted spot in front of you.
Press the red button on the side to activate the transformer.
Take the cube and teleport to the next station.
Place the cube in front of you.
We will now cut this cube in two pieces. First, pick up the magical tool to your right.
Pick up the cube again and place it on the table.
While holding the tool, you can use it by pressing the trigger button as well.
Well done! Now slice the cube at the red highlighted area.
Awesome. Release the tool and it will go back to its original position.

We will now use the 2 pieces to build a staircase. Pick one of them and teleport to the podium to your right. Notice that you can freely teleport in a larger area. Press the trigger button to teleport anywhere between here and the podium.
Well done! You can now climb the steps!
